name: Murkrow
description: Feared and loathed by many, it is believed to bring misfortune to all those who see it at night.

abilities.name: Insomnia
abilities.effect: This Pokémon cannot be asleep.  This causes rest to fail altogether.  If a Pokémon is asleep and acquires this ability, it will immediately wake up; this includes when regaining a lost ability upon leaving battle.  This ability functions identically to vital spirit in battle.

abilities.name: Super Luck
abilities.effect: This Pokémon's moves have critical hit rates one stage higher than normal.
abilities.description: Heightens the critical-hit ratios of moves.

abilities.name: Prankster
abilities.effect: This Pokémon's non-damaging moves have their priority increased by one stage.
abilities.description: Gives priority to a status move.
